detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#94-102) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[sender] = _balances[sender].sub(amount,ERC20: transfer amount exceeds balance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#99)
	- _balances[recipient] = _balances[recipient].add(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#100)

detectors.description:
PolkaCoin (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#229-290) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#62-64)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#35)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#65-67)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#73-75)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#76-79)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#37)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#40)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#39)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#36)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#68-72)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#80-85)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PolkaCoin__1.sol#38)
